9984190482071026334.Text: To make homemade potions, you need skill in alchemy, ingredients, and the necessary apparatus. Ingredients can be collected from the animal bodies, plants, and the environment. There are four pieces of alchemist apparatus -- mortar and pestle, alembic, calcinator, and retort. Alchemical apparatus comes in grades of quality; higher quality apparatus is more effective and reliable.
